overview: An exciting sequel to the original program covering the Louisville & Indiana Railroad, this second edition 2-DVD set picks up where its popular predecessor left off and explores the Kentucky Derby Special Trains and Tequila Express Private car, in addition to the P&L Oak Street Yard and locations at Queensville, Scottsburg, Henryville, Old Pennsy Lift Bridge, Essroc Cement, Jeffersonville Yard, Jeff Yard, Panama Yard, and much more!
title: The Louisville & Indiana Railroad - Volume 2
